name: Dodgeball 2
description:
Dodgeball 2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed real life game known as Dodgeball. Dodgeball 2 was made by an entirely different person than the person who made Dodgeball. 

Dodgeball 2 changes several things from the original. The game is now a 1v1. Players must stay inside of an ever shrinking ring in order to stay alive. Balls on the ground despawn after a short while, meaning you need to quick. The last major change is the more balls you hold, the slower you move. 

Controls: 

Player 1:

Arrow keys to move, right Shift to throw balls; 

Player 2:

WASD to Move, Q to throw balls
